summary: Low level Thieves Guild/ Dark Brotherhood. I need to restart a lot and I made this so I wouldn't have to do the quest-lines over and over but also to not start too strong.
descriptionHtml:
I'l always adding mods and always needing to restart the game. Normally when start, I do the Thieve's Guild then Dark Brotherhood. 

Finding a save file for that was easy but I don't like starting the game at a higher level so I made one that starts from nothing but the items from the quests.
 
-Map is completely empty besides Whiterun Stables (spawn point)

-Shadowmere close by

-Stats:

Magicka- 100
Health- 140
Stamina- 100
Carry weight- 300


-Inventory:

Weapons:
Blade of Woe
Nightingale Blade
Nightingale Bow
Staff of Firebolts

Armor:
Amulet of Articulation
Nightweaver's Band
Muiri's Ring
Cicero's set
Guild Master's set
Nightingale set
Shrouded set (with Shrouded Robes)
Tumblerbane Gloves

-Tried to collect most of the books/journals that are important.

-Various keys

-1 Stone of Barenziah




The character is a female Wood Elf named Tsara.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=194775622

^use that tutorial to change it as you please :)

That is all :) hope it can be of some use to someone.
author: Fancypigg
